question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. surfboard
B. white pickup truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white pickup truck is clearly positioned further back in the scene, behind the red pickup truck and the man, while the surfboard is in the foreground being handled by the man.
